item.title: Apache Hop 1.1 is available!!
item.description: After four months of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 1.1.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 1.1 brings: Known Issue Hop Server Docker Apache Beam updates and improvements New and updated plugins Hop Gui improvements Various Community JIRA Download Hop 1.1.0 or download Hop 1.
